Title: Privacy Policy
Introduction: Thank you for choosing to be part of our community at Brussels Fried Chicken. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us through
InformationWeCollect: As you visit, use, or navigate our site, we may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, including but not limited to:
HowWeUseYourInformation: We use personal information collected via our site for a variety of business purposes, including to:
HowWeShareYourInformation: We may share your information in the following situations:
Cookies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Policy.
SecurityOfYourInformation: We aim to protect your personal information through a system of organizational and technical security measures. We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process.
YourPrivacyRights: Depending on your location, you may have the right under privacy laws to request access to, request deletion of, and request the correction of your personal data held by us.
UpdatesToThisPolicy: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated “Revised” date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible.
ContactUs: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may contact through
PersonalIdentifiers: Such as your name, email address, phone number, and addresses when you register on our site, place an order, or participate in an online survey.
PaymentData: We collect necessary data to process your payment if you make purchases, such as your payment instrument number (credit card number), and the security code associated with your payment instrument.
UsageData: Information automatically collected about how you use our site, such as what sections of our site you interact with and what services you purchase.
Marketing: Deliver targeted marketing and promotional offers based on your preferences.
ServiceImprovement: Improve our services and website performance.
UsageAnalysis: Understand and analyze how you use our site and which products are most relevant to you.
ServiceProviders: With Service Providers: We may share your data with third-party vendors, service providers, contractors, or agents who perform services for us or on our behalf and require access to such information to do that work.
BusinessTransfers: Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.
